select count(1) from ( select hs.id from property.t_house_spec hs left join property.t_project p on hs.project_id = p.id left join property.t_project_building pb on hs.building_id = pb.id left join property.t_project_building pb2 on hs.floor_id = pb2.id
) as ttt

select hs.id as id, hs.project_id as projectId, p.full_name as projectName, hs.building_id as buildingId, pb.name as buildingName, pb.code as buildingCode, hs.num as num, hs.house_type as houseType, hs.actual_area as actualArea, hs.gross_area as grossArea, hs.usable_area as usableArea, hs.apportion_area as apportionArea, hs.property_fee as propertyFee, hs.ownership as ownership, hs.oem_code as oemCode, hs.floor_id as floorId, pb2.name as floorName from property.t_house_spec hs left join property.t_project p on hs.project_id = p.id left join property.t_project_building pb on hs.building_id = pb.id left join property.t_project_building pb2 on hs.floor_id = pb2.id
${pager.mysqlQueryCondition}
SELECT COUNT(h.id) FROM property.t_house h LEFT JOIN property.t_house_spec hs ON h.building_id = hs.building_id AND h.house_num LIKE CONCAT('%', hs.num) WHERE hs.id = #{houseSpecId}

select hs.id as id, hs.project_id as projectId, hs.building_id as buildingId, pb.name as buildingName, pb.code as buildingCode, hs.num as num, hs.house_type as houseType, hs.actual_area as actualArea, hs.gross_area as grossArea, hs.usable_area as usableArea, hs.apportion_area as apportionArea, hs.property_fee as propertyFee, hs.ownership as ownership, hs.oem_code as oemCode from property.t_house_spec hs left join property.t_project_building pb on hs.building_id = pb.id where hs.id = #{houseSpecId}
